title: Text-miner
info: This web application, let's the user to upload a pdf document, and it returns the summary of that pdf. No need to read a 25 pages pdf anymore :).
skills: From a design point of view, I had to do the UX journey with the client, and also to create a design in a photoshop. This web application was built with HTML5, CSS3, Javaassets/scripts/Jquery, Firebase and Rest API.
